A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Is it bad that I think Star Wars the last Jedi sucked more than Episode 1? I think at this point I’ll take Jar Jar Binks and Hayden’s horrible lines over whatever shit Disney calls Star Wars these days. I really enjoyed Ray & Snoke. That’s pretty much it. Lol. The new characters they’ve introduced in this trilogy are not worth killing off any of the old ones. Disney has a choice to make I think. Bring J.J Abrams back for episode 9 or just sell Lucas arts to Someone else. Someone willing to fix the total mess that is Star Wars the “New” generation.
